name: Bloo
tag_list: lbs, mobile-web-service, flirt, blooflirt, proximity-dating, bloomingle, location-based
overview:
Enabling proximity communication between mobile users

Bloo AB is a swedish tech company recently started up in Stockholm and is operating under the umbrella of STING (Stockholm Innovation & Growth).

Bloo develops a platform with a new positioning method which enables communication between mobile clients that are geographically close to each other. Neither GPS, Wifi nor GSM triangulation is required; therefore the client application can run on almost all available mobile phone models.

The unique positioning method is simpler than GSP and smarter than Bluetooth! Bloo has a pending patent application.

Bloo also develops several mobile applications upon their lightweight positioning platform, first out is BlooFlirt.

  1. BlooFlirt BlooFlirt is the best mobile flirting application in the world! Flirt spontaneously with geographically nearby interesting people via your mobile phone to ease the social ice-breaking.

  2. BlooMingle Enables automatic business card exchange with mobile phones between members that are within eye sight, without requiring any mobile phone numbers!
